nodes.bodyText:
I'd prefer this be improved or excluded. Perhaps something along these lines? (please check that this is valid javadoc before committing, I didn't 😅 )
/**
 * Draws a menu in the OSRS style at the mouse cursor's position with any client menu settings
 * applied.
 *
 * {@see setMenuAlpha(int alpha)}
 */
In conjunction with my other comment below, this is a more concise

nodes.bodyText: It's not super-important, but this change should be in the first commit so the commits are atomic.
